title: Hello World
description:
Hello World

Write a function that returns the string Hello World.

Example:

  • Input: (no input)
    Output: "Hello World"

Constraints:

  • No input required
  • Return exactly the string 'Hello World'
solution_text:
Hello World

Algorithm:

  1. Return the string literal "Hello World"

Time Complexity: O(1) - constant time

Space Complexity: O(1) - constant space

Key Insights:

  • This is a simple function to verify your environment
  • No computation or logic required
  • Just return the exact string
verify:
def verify(actual_output, expected_output):
    """Verify hello world output"""
    passed = actual_output == expected_output
    return [passed, str(actual_output)]
